Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Moderate not sure this is the right place for this so move as you see fit.


[INDENT]So I have noticed a couple of people have started recommended mod lists threads in the addon forum. I really, really like like this idea but these lists quickly get lost in the very active addon forum. We really at this point could use a subforum in Add-ons for this type of list both to encourage list making and to make finding them easier. There are so many mods. And so many mods that don't get the attention they deserve. This would be a great opportunity to crowdsource different mod lists for various purposes and reasons.

I Am sure there are some rules that would need to be established but I truly believe this would be a great benefit to the KSP community.

Just a thought and thanks for reading.[/INDENT]

My 2 cents, if they were to do something like this it would be a subforum of this forum or Addon Releases rather than a Forum in Addons. Unfortunately I don't think it's going to happen right now, there has been talk of a new forum software so until that happens, they probably don't want to do too much.

(By the way, discussion of the forum itself is probably best in Kerbal Network, just FYI)

I guess I did not think adding a subforum was that big of a deal if there was a need and demand for it.

As for where this thread belongs any chance I could get this moved over the the Kerbal Network forum I agree it would be better there than here.
